plugin.name: xBroadcast_Idle
plugin.author: Bast
plugin.purpose: broadcasts when idle for more than 15 minutes
plugin.description:
[FOR PLUGIN AUTHORS ONLY]
Broadcasts when idle
Example:
function OnPluginBroadcast (msg, id, name, text) if id == "aaabe45678afa22343c5a327" then if msg == 1 then -- do idle if msg == 2 then -- no longer idle end end end

muclient.script:
internalrevision = "$Rev$"
dofile (GetPluginInfo (GetPluginID (), 20) .. "luapath.lua")
require "var" require "pluginhelper" require "verify" require 'ldplugin' require 'serialize'
lastcommand = os.time() idle = false
function idletimer() local idletime = os.time() - lastcommand if idletime > 15*60 then idle = true phelper:broadcast(1) end end
